name: A Nice Girl Like You
description: After being accused of being too inhibited by her ex-boyfriend, a violinist creates a rather wild to-do list that sends her on a whirlwind journey of self-discovery.

review.author: jillbobaggins-07337
review.heading: Never getting this time back...
review.reviewBody: I obviously wasn't expecting a huge amount from this film but thought a light hearted comedy on a Sunday arvo would be perfect. It's terrible... ZERO CHEMISTRY between the leads. Adhir is the best thing about this film to be fair. Honestly, so bad and cringy... don't bother guys..

keywords: sex talk,caught watching pornography,woman wears a bathrobe,music audition,acupuncture
